00024 namespace glm
00025 {
00026     template <typename T> 
00027         inline _xmat2<T> mat2GTX(const T angle)
00028         {
00029         T c = glm::cos(angle);
00030         T s = glm::sin(angle);
00031 
00032                 _xmat3<T> Result;
00033         Result[0][0] = c;
00034         Result[0][1] = s;
00035         Result[1][0] = -s;
00036         Result[1][1] = c;
00037                 return Result;
00038         }
00039 
00040     template <typename T> 
00041         inline _xmat3<T> mat3GTX(const T angle)
00042         {
00043         T c = glm::cos(angle);
00044         T s = glm::sin(angle);
00045 
00046                 _xmat3<T> Result;
00047         Result[0][0] = c;
00048         Result[0][1] = s;
00049                 Result[0][2] = 0.0f;
00050         Result[1][0] = -s;
00051         Result[1][1] = c;
00052                 Result[1][2] = 0.0f;
00053                 Result[2][0] = 0.0f;
00054                 Result[2][1] = 0.0f;
00055                 Result[2][2] = 1.0f;
00056                 return Result;
00057         }
00058 
00059         template <typename T>
00060     inline _xmat3<T> mat3GTX(const _xvec3<T>& angles)
00061     {
00062         T ch = glm::cos(angles.x);
00063         T sh = glm::sin(angles.x);
00064         T cp = glm::cos(angles.y);
00065         T sp = glm::sin(angles.y);
00066         T cb = glm::cos(angles.z);
00067         T sb = glm::sin(angles.z);
00068 
00069         _xmat3<T> Result;
00070         Result[0][0] = ch * cb + sh * sp * sb;
00071         Result[0][1] = sb * cp;
00072         Result[0][2] = -sh * cb + ch * sp * sb;
00073         Result[1][0] = -ch * sb + sh * sp * cb;
00074         Result[1][1] = cb * cp;
00075         Result[1][2] = sb * sh + ch * sp * cb;
00076         Result[2][0] = sh * cp;
00077         Result[2][1] = -sp;
00078         Result[2][2] = ch * cp;
00079         return Result;
00080     }
00081 
00082         template <typename T>
00083     inline _xmat4<T> mat4GTX(const _xvec3<T>& angles)
00084     {
00085         T ch = glm::cos(angles.x);
00086         T sh = glm::sin(angles.x);
00087         T cp = glm::cos(angles.y);
00088         T sp = glm::sin(angles.y);
00089         T cb = glm::cos(angles.z);
00090         T sb = glm::sin(angles.z);
00091 
00092         _xmat4<T> Result;
00093         Result[0][0] = ch * cb + sh * sp * sb;
00094         Result[0][1] = sb * cp;
00095         Result[0][2] = -sh * cb + ch * sp * sb;
00096         Result[0][3] = 0.0f;
00097         Result[1][0] = -ch * sb + sh * sp * cb;
00098         Result[1][1] = cb * cp;
00099         Result[1][2] = sb * sh + ch * sp * cb;
00100         Result[1][3] = 0.0f;
00101         Result[2][0] = sh * cp;
00102         Result[2][1] = -sp;
00103         Result[2][2] = ch * cp;
00104         Result[2][3] = 0.0f;
00105         Result[3][0] = 0.0f;
00106         Result[3][1] = 0.0f;
00107         Result[3][2] = 0.0f;
00108         Result[3][3] = 1.0f;
00109         return Result;
00110     }
00111 }
